subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The six-time champion Rafael Nadal defeated Fernando Verdasco, 6-0, 6-4, to reach the final of the Barcelona Open, where he will face fellow Spaniard David Ferrer for a fourth time.
snippet: The six-time champion Rafael Nadal defeated Fernando Verdasco, 6-0, 6-4, to reach the final of the Barcelona Open, where he will face fellow Spaniard David Ferrer for a fourth time.
